widgets.name: BaseWidget
widgets.description: A standardized structure for all widgets that provides consistent layout and functionality

id.description: Unique identifier for the widget instance

title.description: Title text to be displayed in the widget header

subtitle.description: Subtitle text to be displayed below the title

description.description: Additional description text for the widget

showTitle.description: Whether to display the widget title

showSubtitle.description: Whether to display the widget subtitle

showDescription.description: Whether to display the widget description

backgroundType.description: Type of background to display for the widget

backgroundColor.description: Background color when backgroundType is COLOR

backgroundGradient.description: CSS gradient value when backgroundType is GRADIENT

backgroundImage.description: URL of background image when backgroundType is IMAGE

titleTypographyVariant.description: Typography variant for the widget title

subtitleTypographyVariant.description: Typography variant for the widget subtitle

descriptionTypographyVariant.description: Typography variant for the widget description

layout.description: Layout type for the widget content

contentAlignment.description: Alignment of content within the widget

isLoading.description: Whether the widget is in a loading state

loadingComponent.description: Component to display when isLoading is true

errorComponent.description: Component to display when there's an error

emptyComponent.description: Component to display when there's no content

headerRightComponent.description: Component to display at the right side of the widget header

footerComponent.description: Component to display at the footer of the widget

contentProps.description: Custom props to pass to the content component

customClassName.description: Additional CSS class to apply to the widget

customHeaderClassName.description: Additional CSS class to apply to the widget header

customContentClassName.description: Additional CSS class to apply to the widget content

customFooterClassName.description: Additional CSS class to apply to the widget footer

onMount.description: Function to call when widget is mounted

onUnmount.description: Function to call when widget is unmounted

onError.description: Function to call when widget encounters an error

dataSources.description: List of data sources to fetch data from

id.description: Unique identifier for the data source

method.description: HTTP method to use for fetching data

params.description: Parameters to send with the request

headers.description: Headers to send with the request

transformResponse.description: Function to transform the response data

children.description: Child components or widgets to render within this widget

DEFAULT.description: Standard layout with header, content, and footer sections vertically stacked

GRID.description: Content items arranged in a responsive grid
GRID.contentStyle: display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(250px, 1fr)); gap: var(--dls-spacing-md);

HORIZONTAL.contentStyle: display: flex; flex-direction: row; overflow-x: auto;

VERTICAL.description: Content items arranged vertically with specific spacing
VERTICAL.contentStyle: display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: var(--dls-spacing-md);

defaultErrorState.descriptionText: We're having trouble loading this content. Please try again later.

defaultEmptyState.descriptionText: There is no content to display at this time.
